introduction: Grief transcends through time and space...“Interdimensional Melancholy” is a personal project we created during our first TEAM TUMULT ANI-JAM in May 2019! We just animated like crazy for about a week to the given themes "Interdimensional" & "Melancholy", which were provided by our Instagram Followers. The result is this 1-minute shortfilm about funerals, bursting bubbles and black holes.
